content: nucleus beanie pattern by holly madison of blue barn fiber yarn shown squishy bulky from blue barn fiber colors black mc mermaid hair cc a fun hat inspired by the nucleus of a cell which is often easily seen under a microscope and appears as a tiny dot in the center method knitting skill level beginner/intermediate finished size approximately 9 tall and 8 wide -pattern is written for an average adult needles 5 5mm/us 9 circular knitting needles 16 yarn light bulky weight 5 yarn two partial skeins approximately 75g mc 25g cc for this pattern i used blue barn fiber squishy bulky base in a variety of colors other stitch marker tapestry needle pom pom optional gauge 2x2 = 8 stitches wide x 10 tall *see last page for sizing info and further details abbreviations co- cast on k- knit mc- main color cc- contrasting color *- repeat st s - stitch es k2tog- knit 2 stitches together yarn shown squishy bulky from blue barn fiber colors undyed mc baroque cc brim using a long tail method co 60 sts with mc on us 9 5 5mm place marker and join for working in the round round 1 mc *ktbl p1* rounds 2-9 mc *k1 p1* round 10 mc *k* the colorwork begins in the body on next page a note regarding the colorwork this pattern is written in the round from the bottom up and uses the fair isle knitting colorwork technique each row of squares or cells is outlined in sections with this technique the color that s not being currently used will create floats in the back for this reason it s best to not knit too tightly and gently stretch your work on your right needle as you go so that the hat has room to stretch and the floats aren t too tight there are many techniques for knitting with two colors at once but i personally find it easiest to hold the cc in my left hand continental style then hold the mc in my right hand at the same time diagram for visual people- the colorwork begins on the bottom right corner of the diagram from right to left each vertical column is the next row of the round right after stitch marker ppaayy ssppeecciiaall aatttteennttiioonn ttoo tthhee ffiirrsstt ssttiittcchh iinn rroowwss 88 aanndd 2200 body colorwork chart first row of cells row 1 and 2 *cc k3 mc k1* row 3 *cc k1 mc k1* row 4 and 5 *cc k3 mc k1* in between cells section row 6 and 7 *mc k* second row of cells row 8 mc k2 *cc k3 mc k1* to last 2 sts knit 2 in cc row 9 cc k1 mc k1 *cc k3 mc k1* to last 2 sts knit 2 in cc row 10 *cc k1 mc k1* row 11 and 12 cc k1 mc k1 *cc k3 mc k1* to last 2 sts cc k2 in between cells section starts on
